thread.section_title: News24, South Africa's premier news source, provides breaking news on national, world, Africa, sport, entertainment, technology & more.
thread.title: No more comments, no more MyNews24
thread.title_full: No more comments, no more MyNews24 | News24

author: news24.com
title: No more comments, no more MyNews24
text:
This will be my final adieu, the last article I will write for News24. MyNews24 was a place we could have discussions and enjoy the cameraderie of knowing we were not alone in our fight against superstition.
I will be creating my own blog again, give me a few days and we can discuss the issues of the day again. unf'nbelievable.co.za type the full word.
